description: The .NET Framework 4.8.1 Developer Pack lets developers build applications that target the .NET Framework 4.8.1 by using Visual Studio 2022 or other IDEs. This is a single package that bundles the .NET Framework 4.8.1, the .NET 4.8.1 Targeting Pack, and the .NET Framework 4.8.1 SDK.
summary: The .NET Framework 4.8.1 Developer Pack lets developers build applications that target the .NET Framework 4.8.1.
author: Microsoft
